credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Study for "The Signal of Distress"
medium: Graphite, brush and blue-green, brown, and yellow watercolor, gray wash,  traces of black ink on white heavy wove watercolor paper.
description: Vertical view from bridge of ship, showing railing with benches and stormy sea beyond, as two men work in a lifeboat with ropes and pulleys, at center right.
name: Drawing
